basics.name: Chun-Kai Wang
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: A full-stack engineer, focus on JavaScript/Node.js, Web Development and DevOps.

location.address: No.109, Ln. 95, Guling St., Zhongzheng Dist.

work.summary: Software lead for projects, provided technical direction to the team members, worked closely with the Software Engineers and Product Managers, planned software staffing and product development.
highlights: Led R&D team members to design and develop an company's internal ad reporting system that improved media team workflow and dramatically increased productivity.
Introduced Agile Software Development methodology for project that required quick turnaround and transparency.
Designed, implemented and supported fully automated Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery processes.

work.summary: Participated in system design, development and maintenance for digital marketing advertising platform.
highlights: Developed an agency trading desk to integrate Facebook, Google & Punwave DSP to serve ads with dynamic budget allocation.
Developed an ad optimization system for cross-media performance monitoring and dynamic budget allocation according to the ad performance in real-time.
Implemented ad pixel code to track and find proper Target Audience for remarketing campaigns.

work.company: Dept. of Information Management, National Taiwan University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Assisted executing industry-university cooperative research project with Foxlink International Inc.
highlights: Developed a user-customized service platform for IoT-based senser devices.
Designed data exchange format and API specifications.

work.company: Dept. of Information Management, National Taiwan University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Assisted researches of National Science Council project "Integrity Assurance on App Program Source and Data Exchange among Apps".
highlights: Provided a mechanism to solve App repackaging and source integrity assurance issue.
Designed and implemented the App Integrity Detection Application module and App Screener server module.

work.summary: Served in Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School for compulsory military service, led more than 400 students.
highlights: Handled affairs of students' rewards and punishments.
Developed a leave system for group's human management by using VBA.
Received outstanding contribution award during the service period.

work.company: Dept. of Information Management, National Taiwan University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Develop the website for the department.
highlights: Responsible for website front-end programming and development.
Use PHP an MySQL to build the website and make sure it works on mainstream browsers.
